message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 3-4-2, translated into en
data:
Data availability

Description:

Around 70 countries currently provide WHO with regular high-quality data on mortality by age, sex and causes of death, and another 40 countries submit data of lower quality. However, comprehensive cause-of-death estimates are calculated by WHO systematically for all of its Member States (with a certain population threshold) every 3 years.

Disaggregation:

Sex, age group
